function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ventilation systems that recirculate a proportion of indoor air can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if not properly regulated.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within indoor environments.","Mitigation":"Implementing higher rates of outdoor air supply and air exchange to reduce the concentration of potentially infectious airborne particles.","Technologies":"Use of high-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters and in-duct UVGI air disinfection systems to reduce airborne pathogen transmission.","People":"Occupants of indoor environments such as offices, classrooms, and other public spaces.","Owner":"Building managers, facility maintenance teams, and public health authorities."}]}
